sentence: We could walk to all the restaurants we had booked a huge plus and some nice wine tasting rooms also
Stayed in 2nd level suite which looked brand new
Room was beautifully appointed and clean
The rooms are so nice with a fireplace cozy bed cute little touches
Lovely place with spacious rooms and a fireplace and outdoor seating situated close to all the good restaurants in Yountvile
Great but frustrated by the room situation
The room and the gardens grounds were beautiful
Good in room amenities
Although the room was very spacious and comfortable it was really nice to also have a separate covered balcony

The staff member working at that time was also very nice and I was impressed that after simply mentioning that we had already checked in and that I was there to pick up our room keys she knew who I was and immediately greeted me by name giving the feeling that she had been expecting us
Hope that happened only in the room we stayed as we definitely want to go back next time for another romantic getaway without a kid
I truly hope so as right now the renovated rooms have lost their charm
The price of the room is definitely worth it
The remodeled rooms are very nice but the ongoing construction was annoying
We also had a complimentary bottle of wine in our room when we arrived
The rooms are as spacious as before but has also been modified to a more Four Season atmosphere
24 hour hot tub
They would bring me hot water for tea in our room carry your bags fetch your car make dinner reservations and more
We had a 2nd floor room with vaulted ceilings that made the room feel even larger
We checked out of the room around midnight and when I returned the plastic rooms keys to check out the man behind the front desk never asked me if we enjoyed our stay or anything else for that matter
The rooms although very expensive were extremely roomy
The bathroom was one of our favorite parts of the room last time
We arrived on a Wednesday afternoon around noon and were excited to find out that our room was ready early so that we could get settled in before an afternoon of wine tastings

I think that is due to two reasons – the employees who clean the rooms are not very meticulous about replenishment so that items used by the prior occupants frequently get charged to the next occupant and there are employees who frequently pilfer from the mini bars precisely because of the lack of precise control
One day when we got back to the room we were surprised to find they had left us a bottle of wine and champagneThanks and looking forward to our next stay
Separate shower would have been better
Although the service was good for the most part there were 2 times in one night that room service was knocking very hard on our door when we did not order and I was trying to sleep
